name: ABC
text:
The owner says no police showed up to stop the looting at his shop, but 15 officers appeared while he was cleaning it up.

 "I was with three black men and 15 police come to us and they're thinking I was trying to vandalize my own store."
 https://t.co/W37m2DN8wJ

name: ABC
text: RT @MarthaRaddatz: Your Lincoln Memorial this evening. https://t.co/QByGgWeDDm

name: ABC
text: 'America in Pain – What Comes Next?' | Our live one-hour special begins at 9/8c on ABC. https://t.co/ApEUb3z93W https://t.co/HZJF45BvQF

name: ABC
text: Coronavirus task force coordinator Dr. Deborah Birx says “I worry terribly about the peaceful protests,” adding that the federal government is working with mayors to expand testing availability so protesters can get tested. https://t.co/5RexmYYj45 https://t.co/3eQCCOBsuf

name: ABC
text: The Congressional Black Caucus is at work on a package of reform bills the House could advance later this month in response to the death of George Floyd, says Rep. Karen Bass, the chair of the caucus. https://t.co/epM0SrwKPC

name: ABC
text: WATCH LIVE: We have continuing coverage of protests from coast to coast following the death of George Floyd in Minnesota. https://t.co/YNmtDjvRmn

name: ABC
text: A doctor contracted by the Dept. of Homeland Security to advise on detention health conditions appeared before Congress on Tuesday to personally criticize the Trump administration as COVID-19 continues to spread through civil immigration detention centers. https://t.co/JdsL0rFRmy

name: ABC

name: ABC
text: RT @GMA: .@SteveOsunsami reports on the boiling point in America and talks to experts about how we got here. "There are so many reminders of the pandemic of racism." https://t.co/K0tbPCiqCq #WhatComesNext https://t.co/ETXttHXqgt

name: ABC
text: 27% of adults in a new @ABC News/WaPo poll say they definitely (15%) or probably (12%) would not get vaccinated against the coronavirus. https://t.co/JTdLPlrebf https://t.co/1XCsjczIxs
